channel.title: fields on YoSQL
channel.description: Recent content in fields on YoSQL

item.title: annotateFields
item.description: Controls whether Generated annotations should be added to the generated fields. Configuration Options Option: ‘false’ The default value of the annotateFields configuration option is false. Setting the option to false therefore produces the same code generated as the default configuration. package com.example.persistence; public class SomeRepository { private Object someField; // ... rest of generated code } Option: ’true' Changing the annotateFields configuration option to true adds the @Generated annotation to every generated fields.
